attributes.action: Deselect MP's that disobey Parliamentary Rules
attributes.additional_details: Certain members of Parliament have a job to be Neutral in all voting and debates within the house of Commons it is not their job to take the sides of MP's and influence the outcome of Parliamentary votes actions as such are deemed treacherous and not within the Rules of Parliament, MP's must always remember that they are elected to serve the people and not elected to serve their own needs, (Elected by the People to serve the People) the soon they realise this then democracy will be restored.
attributes.background: Just recently certain MP's have gone against Parliamentary Rules to affect the outcome of Parliamentary votes this is undemocratic and goes against all that is good about Parliament these individuals should be deselected by their constituents and brought to account regarding their behaviour overall.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the selection of MPs is the responsibility of political parties and not the UK Government or Parliament.
